product_name: REI Micro Fleece Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Offering next-to-skin warmth and softness, the REI Micro Fleece men's long-underwear bottoms keep you warm from the inside out during cold-weather activities such as skiing or snowshoeing. Lightweight, quick-dry polyester micro fleece insulates while remaining breathable; long-underwear bottoms can be worn alone on mild days. Fabric features built-in UPF 50+ sun protection. Special buy.
